nodeList.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that also prepares you to riposte incoming hits.

If vengeance successfully hits an enemy and you take a hit in the next 2 seconds you will riposte, taking 30% less damage and striking at a nearby enemy.

nodeList.description: You deal global increased damage while preparing to riposte.
nodeList.nodeDescription: You have [20%] global increased damage per point while preparing to riposte

node.description: You can {Riposte} an additional time after Vengeance hits an enemy, but Riposte mitigates less damage.
node.nodeDescription: 10% reduced attack speed. You can riposte an additional time after you hit an enemy with vengeance.

nodeList.description:
{Riposte} has a chance to grant a {Void Essence}, which last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced stun duration.

You can have a maximum of 3 Void Essences at once.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
[15%] chance per point to gain a void essence on hit with riposte.

Void essences last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced duration of stuns on you.

You can have a maximum of 3 void essences at once.

node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that also prepares you to riposte incoming hits.

stats.statName: Void Essence Chance On Riposte Hit

nodeList.altText: {Void Essence} grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced stun duration. You can have a maximum of 3 essences at once.
nodeList.description: Kills with Vengeance have a chance to grant you a {Void Essence}.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
[15%] chance per point to gain a void essence on kill with vengeance.

Void essences last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced duration of stuns on you.

You can have a maximum of 3 void essences at once.

node.description:
{Riposte} has a chance to grant a {Void Essence}, which last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced stun duration.

You can have a maximum of 3 Void Essences at once.
node.nodeDescription:
[15%] chance per point to gain a void essence on hit with riposte.

Void essences last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced duration of stuns on you.

You can have a maximum of 3 void essences at once.

A melee attack that also prepares you to riposte incoming hits.

If vengeance successfully hits an enemy and you take a hit in the next 2 seconds you will riposte, taking 30% less damage and striking at a nearby enemy.

stats.statName: Void Essence Chance On Riposte Hit

node.description: Vengeance hits deal more damage against enemies that are already damaged (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Vengeance deals [15%] more damage per point (multiplicative with other modifiers) against enemies that are already damaged

A melee attack that also prepares you to riposte incoming hits.

If vengeance successfully hits an enemy and you take a hit in the next 2 seconds you will riposte, taking 30% less damage and striking at a nearby enemy.

node.altText: {Iron Blade} is a melee attack that releases a sword that pierces through enemies, dealing physical damage. Its damage does not scale with nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: {Iron Blade} has a chance to reduce enemy armor.
node.nodeDescription: Iron blade has [20%] chance to shred armour on hit per point

node.altText: {Iron Blade} is a melee attack that releases a sword that pierces through enemies, dealing physical damage. Its damage does not scale with nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: {Iron Blade} has a chance to deal double damage.
node.nodeDescription: Iron blade has [15%] chance per point to deal double damage

node.altText: {Iron Blade} is a melee attack that releases a sword that pierces through enemies, dealing physical damage. Its damage does not scale with nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: Vengeance also has a chance to strike the enemy with {Iron Blade}.
node.nodeDescription: [5%] chance per point to also attack with iron blade when you hit an enemy with vengeance.

node.description: Vengeance hits deal more damage against enemies that are already damaged (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Vengeance deals [15%] more damage per point (multiplicative with other modifiers) against enemies that are already damaged

A melee attack that also prepares you to riposte incoming hits.

If vengeance successfully hits an enemy and you take a hit in the next 2 seconds you will riposte, taking 30% less damage and striking at a nearby enemy.

node.altText: {Iron Blade} is a melee attack that releases a sword that pierces through enemies, dealing physical damage. Its damage does not scale with nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: {Iron Blade} travels faster, causing it to also travel further.
node.nodeDescription: Iron blade travels [15%] faster and further per point

node.altText: {Iron Blade} is a melee attack that releases a sword that pierces through enemies, dealing physical damage. Its damage does not scale with nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: You have a chance to attack with {Iron Blade} when you kill an enemy with {Riposte}.
node.nodeDescription: [20%] chance per point to attack with iron blade when you kill an enemy with riposte.

node.description: Vengeance deals more damage if you are below half health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
